User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.7; rv:7.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0.1
Build ID: 20110928134238

Steps to reproduce:

Open Firefox at login in OS X 10.7.1, either by restarting with Firefox open and "Reopen windows when logging back in" checked or enabling "Open at Login" for Firefox in the OS X dock. Have other login items (in my case, BetterTouchTool, smcFanControl, SizeUp, and BootChamp, but the specific items are unimportant). I tried reinstalling Firefox and disabling all add-ons.


Actual results:

Firefox loads and is useable immediately, and everything else about the computer also seems functional, except the other login items take an extra 30-40 seconds to load after boot is complete.

Console entries for Firefox:
10/1/11 11:31:25.596 PM firefox: Process manager already initialized -- can't fully enable headless mode.
10/1/11 11:31:28.483 PM [0x0-0x15015].org.mozilla.firefox: DVFreeThread - CFMachPortCreateWithPort hack = 0x32474b0, fPowerNotifyPort= 0x3247170
10/1/11 11:31:28.860 PM [0x0-0x15015].org.mozilla.firefox: DVFreeThread - CFMachPortCreateWithPort hack = 0x324b620, fPowerNotifyPort= 0x324b0b0
10/1/11 11:31:29.916 PM [0x0-0x15015].org.mozilla.firefox: DVFreeThread - CFMachPortCreateWithPort hack = 0x1e2c0e0, fPowerNotifyPort= 0x1e2c1f0
10/1/11 11:31:30.146 PM [0x0-0x15015].org.mozilla.firefox: DVFreeThread - CFMachPortCreateWithPort hack = 0x3250a40, fPowerNotifyPort= 0x3250a20


Expected results:

Other login items should start immediately along with Firefox.

comments.text:
I have to revise the original bug report, as this turns out to be not quite correct:

> Open Firefox at login in OS X 10.7.1, either by restarting with Firefox open
> and "Reopen windows when logging back in" checked or enabling "Open at
> Login" for Firefox in the OS X dock. Have other login items (in my case,
> BetterTouchTool, smcFanControl, SizeUp, and BootChamp, but the specific
> items are unimportant). I tried reinstalling Firefox and disabling all
> add-ons.

The problem only occurs when logging after logging out or rebooting with "Reopen windows when logging back in" checked. If that box is unchecked, but "Open at Login" is checked on Firefox in the dock, everything loads immediately as it should. For now I have fixed my boot by disabling the resume feature entirely as described here:
http://osxdaily.com/2011/08/25/disable-reopen-windows-when-logging-back-in-in-mac-os-x-lion-completely/
